column3: Could you pass an increased `wait` here or maybe better yet make sync_blocks calculate a wait based on timeout unless it's explicitly passed.   Otherwise the 1000 lines of the debug log that travis saves quickly fill up.
Forgot about that, thanks -- bumped the wait to 5 seconds.  No objection to teaching sync_blocks to be smarter as well, but I'd like this merged asap to get the test suite working again.
